OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is processing.

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to STREAM for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

CONNECTOR_CONFIDENCE_LEVEL.description: The default confidence level for created entities (0-100).

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_ID.description: The ID of the live stream to listen to.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_LISTEN_DELETE.description: Listen to delete events in the stream.

CONNECTOR_CONTAINER_TYPES.description: List of container types to process.

MISP_SSL_VERIFY.description: Verify SSL certificates when connecting to MISP.

MISP_OWNER_ORG.description: Organization that will own the events in MISP

MISP_DISTRIBUTION_LEVEL.description: Distribution level for MISP events: 0: Your organisation only, 1: This community only, 2: Connected communities, 3: All communities

MISP_THREAT_LEVEL.description: Threat level for MISP events: 1: High, 2: Medium, 3: Low, 4: Undefined

MISP_TAG_OPENCTI.description: Add OpenCTI-specific tags to MISP events.

MISP_TAG_PREFIX.description: Prefix for OpenCTI tags in MISP.

MISP_HARD_DELETE.description: Perform hard deletion of MISP events (permanent deletion without blocklisting). If False, deleted events are added to the blocklist to prevent re-importation. If True, events are permanently deleted and can be re-imported later.

PROXY_NO_PROXY.description: Comma-separated list of hosts to bypass proxy.
